bibl.title: The Discovery of Christian Egypt. From Manuscript Hunters towards an Archaeology of Late Antique Egypt.
Coptic Civilization. Two Thousand Years of Christianity in Egypt.

bibl.note: Ottoman Egypt (1517-1805). - Muhammad Ali and His Successors (1805-81). - The British Occupation (1882-1922). - The Constitutional Monarchy (1923-52). - The Egyptian Republic (1952-present). - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Elisabeth O'Connell, The Discovery of Christian Egypt. From Manuscript Hunters towards an Archaeology of Late Antique Egypt.
Gawdat Gabra (ed.), Coptic Civilization. Two Thousand Years of Christianity in Egypt (Cairo - New York, 2014) pp. 163-176, 5 figg. coul.

Ottoman Egypt (1517-1805). - Muhammad Ali and His Successors (1805-81). - The British Occupation (1882-1922). - The Constitutional Monarchy (1923-52). - The Egyptian Republic (1952-present). - Conclusion.
